SEARCH

Package game.gui

package game.gui
  • Classes
    Class
    Description
    FinalScenePanel
    A panel that shows the final scene with a fade-in and fade-out effect, then returns the player to the main menu.
    LevelTransitionPanel
    A panel that handles level transition with a fade-in and fade-out effect, displaying a "LEVEL COMPLETE!" message in the middle.
    MainMenu
    The Main Menu screen where the player can start a new game or load a saved game.
    PauseMenu
    A panel that appears when the game is paused, allowing the player to continue, save the game, or return to the main menu.
